job_tasks.phrase: ontwerp, ontwikkel en implementeer je ook nieuwe baanbrekende AI-modellen en oplossingen-zoals Large Language Models (LLM's) in combinatie met Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions designing, developing, and implementing AI models, specifically highlighting LLMs and RAG, which are core to generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: het bouwen van innovatieve AI-oplossingen voor de verzekeringssector.
job_tasks.justification: The role is about building AI solutions, implying software development to integrate and deploy these solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Dagelijks werkt het feature team aan Inpact.AI, om verzekeringsprofessionals te helpen om snel en effectief grote hoeveelheden data te verwerken
job_tasks.justification: Working on 'Inpact.AI' and helping professionals process data indicates the development and maintenance of a software application.

job_tasks.phrase: het optimaliseren van prestaties, verhogen van schaalbaarheid
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing performance and increasing scalability are key aspects of ensuring AI models and systems are production-ready and efficient.

soft_skills.phrase: Samen met collega-experts werk je aan geavanceerde technologieën
verzekeringsprofessionals te helpen om snel en effectief grote hoeveelheden data te verwerken

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes designing, developing, and implementing advanced AI solutions, specifically mentioning Large Language Models (LLMs) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). This focus on generative models and building user-facing AI applications aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
